Key Match Events: Evan Mobley finished with 25 points, eight rebounds and three blocks, the most impactful player on the floor.
Scottie Barnes had a 3-for-14 night when he had to go at Evan Mobley.
Gradey Dick had a nifty floater, driving to his left, for his first NBA bucket.
Jamal Shead had some nice moments as a defender and playmaker.
Jamison Battle and Bruno Fernando played meaningful minutes off the bench for the Raptors.
Mogbo made his first NBA 3-pointer in the game.
Pre-Game Insights: Raptors coach Darko Rajaković said he wants to see Scottie Barnes develop into a franchise player.
Cavaliers head coach Kenny Atkinson wants to warp the way his team spaces the floor and change Evan Mobley's role.
Coach Rajaković emphasized the importance of Barnes learning to exploit switches and being aggressive on the ball when playing in a zone defense.
Atkinson said he will not push Mobley in new directions too quickly, as he wants to get to know him better and learn how to utilize him effectively in the new system.
Post-Match Reflections: Chris Boucher said the Raptors got'slapped in the face' by the loss and it was good for them, especially as a young team.
Barnes said he needs to be more aggressive on the ball and exploit switches more effectively when playing in a zone defense.
Coach Rajaković will ask Barnes to carry reserve-heavy lineups offensively, which will be a difficult task, especially when the Raptors are not fully healthy.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Raptors lost Immanuel Quickley to a right pelvic contusion after a rough fall in the second quarter.
Quickley had 13 points and four assists in 14 minutes before leaving the game.
Gradey Dick continues to attack closeouts aggressively, but needs to work on his counters at the rim.
The Raptors wore purple and black uniforms from the Vince Carter era, which was a unique look.
The Cavaliers threw a zone at the Raptors in reserve-heavy lineups, which made it tough for Barnes to make sense of things.
Coach Rajaković called a timeout in the second quarter to challenge a play, but no foul was called.
Jamal Shead had some nice moments as a defender and playmaker off the bench for the Raptors.
Bruno Fernando and Jamison Battle played meaningful minutes off the bench for the Raptors.
Mogbo made his first NBA 3-pointer in the game.
Rajaković said the team will be in trouble often without Quickley, Barrett, Brown, and Olynyk due to their lack of depth.
